00017 // init for town reputation at game start
00018 #define INITIAL_TOWN_REPUTATION                             0
00019 
00020 // the max and min town opinion of an individual merc can be
00021 #define MAX_TOWN_OPINION                                                50
00022 #define MIN_TOWN_OPINION                                           -50
00023 
00024 // town reputation is currently updated 4x per day: at 9am, noon, 3pm, and 6pm
00025 
00026 // the number of events per day
00027 #define TOWN_OPINION_NUMBER_OF_PERIODS    4
00028 
00029 // the start time after midnight that first town reputation event takes place .. in minutes
00030 #define TOWN_OPINION_START_TIME                             (9 * 60)
00031 
00032 // how often the town opinion events occur...right now every 3 hours
00033 #define TOWN_OPINION_PERIOD                                       (3 * 60)
00034

00036 
00037 void InitializeProfilesForTownReputation( void )
00038 {
00039       UINT32 uiProfileId = 0;
00040 
00041       // initialize the town opinion values in each recruitable merc's profile structure
00042       for( uiProfileId = 0; uiProfileId < FIRST_NPC; uiProfileId++ )
00043       {
00044             memset( &( gMercProfiles[ uiProfileId ].bMercTownReputation ), INITIAL_TOWN_REPUTATION, sizeof( gMercProfiles[ uiProfileId ].bMercTownReputation ) );
00045       }
00046 }

00063 UINT8 GetTownOpinionOfMerc( UINT8 ubProfileId, UINT8 ubTownId )
00064 {
00065       Assert(ubProfileId < FIRST_NPC);
00066       Assert(ubTownId < NUM_TOWNS);
00067 
00068       // return amount
00069       return( gMercProfiles[ ubProfileId ].bMercTownReputation[ ubTownId ] );
00070 }

00072 
00073 UINT8 GetTownOpinionOfMercForSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubTownId )
00074 {
00075       // error check
00076       if( pSoldier == NULL )
00077       {
00078             return( 0 );
00079       }
00080 
00081       Assert(ubTownId < NUM_TOWNS);
00082 
00083       // pass on to 
00084       return( GetTownOpinionOfMerc( pSoldier->ubProfile, ubTownId ) );
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 void UpdateTownOpinionOfThisMerc( UINT8 ubProfileId, UINT8 ubTownId, INT8 bAmount )
00089 {
00090       Assert(ubProfileId < FIRST_NPC);
00091       Assert(ubTownId < NUM_TOWNS);
00092 
00093       // check if opinion would be affected too greatly
00094       if( gMercProfiles[ ubProfileId ].bMercTownReputation[ ubTownId ] + bAmount > MAX_TOWN_OPINION )
00095       {
00096             // maximize
00097             gMercProfiles[ ubProfileId ].bMercTownReputation[ ubTownId ] = MAX_TOWN_OPINION;
00098       }
00099       else if( gMercProfiles[ ubProfileId ].bMercTownReputation[ ubTownId ] + bAmount < MIN_TOWN_OPINION )
00100       {
00101             // minimize
00102             gMercProfiles[ ubProfileId ].bMercTownReputation[ ubTownId ] = MIN_TOWN_OPINION;
00103       }
00104       else
00105       {
00106             // update amount
00107             gMercProfiles[ ubProfileId ].bMercTownReputation[ ubTownId ] += bAmount; 
00108       }
00109 }
00110 
00111 
00112 void UpdateTownOpinionOfThisMercForSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT8 ubTownId, INT8 bAmount )
00113 {
00114       // error check
00115       if( pSoldier == NULL )
00116       {
00117             return;
00118       }
00119 
00120       Assert(ubTownId < NUM_TOWNS);
00121 
00122       // pass this on to the profile based function
00123       UpdateTownOpinionOfThisMerc( pSoldier->ubProfile, ubTownId, bAmount );
00124 }

00126 
00127 void HandleSpreadOfAllTownsOpinion( void )
00128 {
00129       UINT8 ubProfileId;
00130 
00131       // debug message
00132       ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_RED, MSG_DEBUG, L"%s - Spreading town opinions about mercs", WORLDTIMESTR );
00133 
00134       // run though all player-recruitable profiles and update towns opinion of mercs
00135       for( ubProfileId = 0; ubProfileId < FIRST_NPC; ubProfileId++ )
00136       {
00137             HandleSpreadOfTownOpinionForMerc( ubProfileId );
00138       }     
00139 }
00140 
00141 
00142 void HandleSpreadOfTownOpinionForMerc( UINT8 ubProfileId )
00143 {
00144       // handle opinion spread for this grunt
00145       INT32 iDistanceBetweenTowns;
00146       INT8 iCounterA, iCounterB;
00147       INT8 bOpinionOfTownA, bOpinionOfTownB;
00148 
00149       Assert(ubProfileId < FIRST_NPC);
00150 
00151       for( iCounterA = FIRST_TOWN; iCounterA < NUM_TOWNS; iCounterA++ )
00152       {
00153             for( iCounterB = iCounterA; iCounterB < NUM_TOWNS; iCounterB++ )
00154             {
00155                   if( iCounterA != iCounterB )
00156                   {
00157                         bOpinionOfTownA = GetTownOpinionOfMerc( ubProfileId, iCounterA );
00158                         bOpinionOfTownB = GetTownOpinionOfMerc( ubProfileId, iCounterB );
00159 
00160                         iDistanceBetweenTowns = GetTownDistances( iCounterA, iCounterB );
00161 
00162                         // spread opinion between towns
00163                         HandleOpinionOfTownsAboutSoldier( bOpinionOfTownA, bOpinionOfTownB, iDistanceBetweenTowns, ubProfileId );
00164                   }
00165             }
00166       }
00167 }
00168
